attributes.name: prop
attributes.desc: a key of `model`. In the use of validate and resetFields method, the attribute is required
attributes.optionValue: keys of model that passed to `form`

attributes.name: label-width
attributes.desc: width of label, e.g. '50px'. Width `auto` is supported.

attributes.name: required
attributes.desc: whether the field is required or not, will be determined by validation rules if omitted

attributes.name: error
attributes.desc: field error message, set its value and the field will validate error and show this message immediately

attributes.name: show-message
attributes.desc: whether to show the error message

attributes.name: size
attributes.desc: control the size of components in this form-item

slots.name: error
slots.desc: Custom content to display validation message. The scope parameter is { error }

methods.name: resetField
methods.desc: reset current field and remove validation result

methods.name: clearValidate
methods.desc: remove validation status of the field
